doc.field: Series I contains general files, mostly from Foreman's personal hanging file. The contents of this series relate to nearly all facets of Foreman's life and work.

All efforts were made to preserve the original arrangement of the collection. Series I is described at the box level, with a listing of the types of files that are ostensibly contained within. These file types, generated by the finding aid author, are as follows:
Administrative Materials Documentation Drafts Financial Files Grant Materials Outlines Personal Files Press Production Files Publishers' Files Source Material Teaching Materials

Each file type is annotated parenthetically when it pertains to a specific medium or organization. Each box is then annotated, when applicable, with a list of specific works that are referenced within the materials in the box (see Biographical Note for list of works).
